mapper.insert: insert into staff (SId, SName, SPassword, SEmail, SPhone, SSex, SBirthday, SEnter, SMark, SAddress, SAvator) values (#{sid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{semail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sphone,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{ssex,jdbcType=BIT}, #{sbirthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{senter,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{smark,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{saddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{savator,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update staff set SName = #{sname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPassword = #{spassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEmail = #{semail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPhone = #{sphone,jdbcType=CHAR}, SSex = #{ssex,jdbcType=BIT}, SBirthday = #{sbirthday,jdbcType=DATE}, SEnter = #{senter,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SMark = #{smark,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, SAddress = #{saddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SAvator = #{savator,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SId = #{sid,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select SId, SName, SPassword, SEmail, SPhone, SSex, SBirthday, SEnter, SMark, SAddress, SAvator from staff where SId = #{sid,jdbcType=CHAR}
select SId, SName, SPassword, SEmail, SPhone, SSex, SBirthday, SEnter, SMark, SAddress, SAvator from staff
